title: Coming Soon: Sami Sauri’s “Into the Atlantic Islands”
content:
Sami Sauri (director, producer, star) partnered with the distinguished creative team of Sergio Villalba, Christian Rosillo, and Hector Menendez to create Into the Atlantic Islands — a multimedia project made up of short films, analog photography, and physical franzines. We’re sharing the film trailer today and look forward to future installments as they are released over the coming weeks.

You can also follow along at intotheatlanticislands.com and on Instagram.

The post Coming Soon: Sami Sauri’s “Into the Atlantic Islands” appeared first on The Radavist.
author: Josh Weinberg
